author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cipher Pharmaceuticals Q1 Loss Per Share $0.04 From Continuing Operations
text:
Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Cipher Pharmaceuticals Q1 Loss Per Share $0.04 From Continuing Operations Cipher Pharmaceuticals Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $4.6 MILLION VERSUS $8.1 MILLION
* EXPECTS TO ADD SIX NEW PRODUCTS FROM ITS EXISTING PIPELINE TO ITS CANADIAN COMMERCIAL PORTFOLIO IN 2018 AND 2019
* CONTINUES TO PURSUE NEW IN-LICENSING OPPORTUNITIES AND ACQUISITIONS TO FURTHER EXPAND ITS NEAR-TERM PRODUCT PIPELINE
* EXPECTS ITS GLOBAL LICENSING BUSINESS TO PROVIDE A “SOLID BASE” OF HIGH-MARGIN ROYALTY REVENUE IN 2018
